## Summary

Social Garden V1 - A complete personal CRM app for nurturing relationships through voice-first capture and AI-powered insights.

This PR introduces the entire V1 application from the ground up: **116 files, ~24,600 lines of code, 22 commits**.

## Features

### Core Functionality
- **Voice Note Processing** - Record voice notes, Claude AI extracts contacts, preferences, family members, and follow-ups
- **Photo & Screenshot Capture** - Upload images, Claude vision extracts relationship context
- **Contact Management** - Full CRUD with inline editing throughout
- **AI-Powered Briefings** - Get conversation starters, recent highlights, and relationship summaries

### Relationship Health System
- **Gardening Metaphor** - Contacts have health status: thriving, growing, thirsty, parched
- **Cadence Tracking** - Set contact frequency \(often, regularly, seldomly, rarely\)
- **Dashboard Filters** - "Needs Water" and "Upcoming Birthdays" quick filters

### Data Capture
- **Preferences** - ALWAYS/NEVER items with semantic TOPIC vs PREFERENCE classification
- **Family Members** - Track relationships and names
- **Seedlings** - Follow-up items and conversation starters \(ACTIVE/PLANTED status\)
- **Interactions** - Log calls, messages \(text/IG/Telegram/LinkedIn\), meetings, voice notes

### User Experience
- **Offline Support** - Voice notes queue locally when offline, auto-sync when back online
- **Toast Notifications** - Success/error feedback with garden-themed confetti celebrations
- **Search** - Find contacts by name, location, preferences, or interaction history
- **Relative Dates** - "yesterday", "last week" parsing for natural interaction logging

### Production Ready
- **Vercel Deployment** - Configured for production hosting
- **PostgreSQL \(Neon\)** - Migrated from SQLite for cloud deployment
- **Environment Security** - Lazy API key validation, secure secrets management

## Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|------------|
| Framework | Next.js 14.2 \(App Router\) |
| Language | TypeScript 5 \(strict mode\) |
| Database | PostgreSQL \(Neon\) + Prisma 5.22 |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS 3.4 |
| AI | Anthropic Claude API |
| Testing | Vitest + React Testing Library |
| Hosting | Vercel |
